weh_prefs_description_auto_sort.message: If this option is enabled, the bookmarks will be sorted when bookmarks are added, changed, moved or deleted. This means you cannot move any bookmarks in the same folder, unless it is moved over a separator.

weh_prefs_description_delay.message: Specifies a delay (in seconds) before automatically sorting bookmarks. Value from 1 to 200.

weh_prefs_description_case_insensitive.message: If this option is enabled, the bookmarks will be sorted without considering the letter case.

weh_prefs_description_sort_by.message: Specifies the first sort criteria to sort the bookmarks. The choices are : name and url.

weh_prefs_description_inverse.message: if this option is enabled, the order specified in 'Sort By' will be reversed. So the order will be descending.

weh_prefs_description_then_sort_by.message: Specifies the second sort criteria to sort the bookmarks. The choices are : node, name and url.

weh_prefs_description_then_inverse.message: If this option is enabled, the order specified in 'Then Sort By' will be reversed.

weh_prefs_description_folder_sort_by.message: Specifies a sort criteria to sort folders.

weh_prefs_description_folder_inverse.message: If this option is enabled, the order speficied in 'Sort Folder By' will be reversed.

weh_prefs_description_folder_sort_order.message: Specifies the folder sort order. Value from 1 to 2.

weh_prefs_description_bookmark_sort_orde.message: Specifies the bookmark sort order. Value from 1 to 2.
